name: Parkourism v1
description:
So... You like fast-paced, FPS and parkour games huh? Oh, you, already have that in KARLSON?! Well guess what idc... play this bean game instead... or i eat u cookie

Parkourism is a free-to-play game being developed by ItzStingray (YT too sub lol or i eat your cookies) It is currently in early access, and a few more versions will be released in order to keep the game semi-fun. After a few updates, I will stop posting updates till the first OFFICIAL version is released. Till then, play a tutorial, lol!

Parkourism is HEAVILY based off of KARLSON, made by DaniDev. Even the MOVEMENT is taken from his tutorial lmao. So have fun... btw im so bad at coding lol

Changelog v1:

Added 2 new levels: Escape 1 and Sandbox 1

Added more poggers music

better grappling sound effect

Use da botton on da main menu to sub 2 meee

Added tooltips in the levels screen

Fixed the grappling gun rotation glitch
